question: What are the conditions necessary for obtaining ITC
conditions for ITC
answer:
Following four conditions are to be satisfied by the registered taxable person for obtaining ITC:
(a) he is in possession of tax invoice or debit note or such other tax paying documents (such as bill of 
entry or any other document prescribed under the Customs Act, ISD invoice as prescribed in Rule 36(1) 
of the TSGST Rules).
(b) he has received the goods or services or both; 
(c) the supplier has actually paid the tax charged in respect of the supply to the government; and 
(d) he has furnished the return under section 39.

question: Fake Distributorship Query or Complaint
Need to report a suspected fake distributorship? I'll guide you through the process
answer: Dear, Thank you for bringing this to our attention. We appreciate your vigilance in verifying its authenticity. We would like to clarify that the email you received is not an official communication from ITC Limited. We want to make it clear that ITC Limited does not require any form of deposits or advance payments for providing distributorships/franchises. It has come to our attention that some fraudulent individuals have been impersonating representatives of ITC Limited, circulating counterfeit forms, and unlawfully soliciting monetary payments. We would like to strongly assert that these individuals or entities are in no way associated with or authorized by ITC Limited. Our company does not own or control the domain names, websites, and email addresses they have used to communicate. For your own protection, we strongly advise you to visit our official website at www.itcportal.com , where you can find a cautionary notice for the public about such fraudulent activities. This elaborate scheme to defraud the public by impersonating ITC Limited is currently under scrutiny by the Delhi High Court and is being investigated. We ask that you do not entertain these fraudsters, engage in further communication with them, or make any payments. Please remember that all official communication from ITC Limited will only come from email addresses ending in @itc.in. For additional information, please visit our official fraud alert page: https://www.itcportal.com/fraud-alert.aspx . Thank you for bringing this matter to our attention. Should you require further assistance, please do not hesitate to contact us. Best Regards, Team ITC Cares 1800-425-444-444

topic: conditions for transfer of ITC in sale
question: Conditions for transfer of ITC IN sale
Considering ITC transfer during sale, merger, or amalgamation? Discover the conditions involved
answer:
The conditions to be fulfilled in case of transfer of credit on account of sale, merger, amalgamation, 
demerger, lease, transfer of business are as under: 
(a) Form GST ITC-02 containing the details of the sale, merger, amalgamation, de-merger, lease, transfer 
of business be furnished.
(b) A certificate issued by a practicing Chartered/ Cost Accountant certifying that the sale, merger, 
amalgamation, de-merger, lease, transfer of business has been done along with a provision for transfer 
of liabilities.
(c) Transferee to accept the details submitted in GST ITC-02. Post acceptance, the credit specified in 
Form GSTR ITC-02 will be credited to the electronic credit ledger of transferee. 
(d) The inputs and capital goods so transferred are to be accounted in the transferee’s books

answer:

Thank you for your inquiry about our products. Your enthusiasm for our product line is deeply appreciated.

We want to reassure you that we are actively restocking our product range to meet customer demand. Our supply chain team is putting in their best efforts to make sure the product you are interested in becomes available to you as quickly as possible.

In the meantime, we would like to remind you of the multiple channels through which you can acquire our products:

1. Shop at ITC Store, your one-stop shop for all our products.
2. Visit retail outlets by locating your nearest FMCG store through ITC Store Locator.
3. Our products are also available on major e-commerce platforms like Amazon, Flipkart, BigBasket and popular food delivery apps like Swiggy and Zomato.

For more tailored assistance, we kindly ask you to share the following details:

1. The specific ITC product and its variant you wish to purchase. 
2.  The complete postal address (including pin code) where you'd like the product delivered. 
3. Your contact number.

Your satisfaction is of utmost importance to us. Should you have further inquiries or require additional assistance, please do not hesitate to contact us at the below number.

answer: Dear, Thank you for expressing your interest in an internship at ITC. answer: Dear Customer, Thank you for expressing your interest in employment opportunities with ITC. question: Duplicate product
Duplicate packaging of Product
answer:
Dear Customer, 

Thank you for bringing this matter to our attention. We take the issue of counterfeit/duplicate products extremely seriously and we appreciate your vigilance in reporting this concern. Ensuring the authenticity and quality of our products is paramount to us.

To expedite our investigation and assist you better, we kindly request you to provide the following details about the product:

 1. Name of the product:
 2. Manufacturing date and batch number (as mentioned on the product) 
 3. Where and when you purchased the product 
 4. Any noticeable differences between this product and genuine ITC products 
 5. Any other details that may help us in our investigation. 
 6. Product images (front and back) 

Additionally, please share the following personal details so our team can contact you for a more detailed discussion:

1. Full Name
2. Contact Number
3. Email Address
4. Your location 

Once we receive this information, a member of our team will get in touch with you at the earliest to discuss the case and next steps in detail.

We are committed to ensuring your satisfaction and your trust in our products. We appreciate your patience and cooperation in this matter.

Best regards,
Team ITC Cares,
1800-425-444-444
